Research_direction: 木材干燥与材性改良；木制品加工工艺
Paper:
发表科研论文60余篇，其中SCI收录30余篇。申请专利30余件，获批发明专利6件、实用新型专利20余件。
1. Honghai Liu, Yueting Zhang, Lin Yang, Zhihui Wu. Effects of Ultrasound Pretreatment on Microstructure and Drying Characteristics of Eucalyptus urophylla × E. grandis[J].Bioresources,2018,13(3):5953-5964.
2. Lin Yang, Honghai Liu, Yingchun Cai,Wu Zhihui. A novel method of studying the collapsed cell of eucalyptus wood using X-ray CT scanning[J].Drying Technology,2019,37(12):1597-1604.
3. Honghai Liu, Jingwen Zhang, Wenjing Jiang, Yingchun Cai. Characteristics of Commercial-scale Radio-frequency/ Vacuum (RF/V) Drying for Hardwood Lumber[J].Bioresources,2019,14(3):6923-6935.
4. Fu, Z., Zhou, Y., Gao, X., Liu, H., Zhou, F. Changes of water related properties in radiata pine wood due to heat treatment[J]. Construction and Building Materials, 2019, 227, 116692.
5.Yang Lin, Liu honghai. Study of the collapse and recovery of Eucalyptus urophydis during conventional kiln drying[J]. European Journal of Wood and Wood Products, 2021, 79 (1): 129–137.
6. Yin Qin, Liu Honghai. Drying Stress and Strain of Wood: A Review[J]. Appl. Sci., 2021, 11(11): 5023.
7. Liu Yunxai, Liu Honghai, Shen Zhongrong. Nanocellulose based filtration membrane in industrial waste water treatment: A Review. Materials, 2021, 14(18): 5398.
8. Zhou T, Liu HH. Research Progress of Wood Cell Wall Modification and Functional Improvement: A Review. Materials, 2022, 15(4):1598.
9. Liu, H., Xie, J., and Zhang, J. Moisture transfer and drying stress of eucalyptus wood during supercritical CO2 (ScCO2) dewatering and ScCO2 combined oven drying, BioResources, 2022, 17(3): 5116-5128.
Projects: 主持国家自然科学基金面上项目1项、省部级课题2项、校企合作等项目8项，参与国家自然科学基金3项。
Award_status: 2016年获江苏省高校“青蓝工程”中青年学术带头人称号。
Title: ：副教授
Name: 刘洪海
Experience:

2005.10～2010.09 日本爱媛大学（松山），木材科学与技术，硕士、博士学位
工作背景：

2004.02～2005.09 品控管理，IKEA（香港）贸易有限公司哈尔滨代表处
2010.10～2013.06 研究员，日本企业博士后工作站（YASUJIMA CO., ltd）
2013.07～201.08  博士后，华南农业大学林学院
2014.09～现在    副教授 南京林业大学家居与工业设计学院
